entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as being spoken to by Lucius. He is described as having a fire in his blue eyes.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: A governor at Hogwarts, who has come to speak with Dumbledore about suspending him.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: The one who is presenting the Order of Suspension to Dumbledore. He is described as being lazy and taking out a long roll of parchment.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A person who is alarmed by the idea of Dumbledore being suspended. He is mentioned as saying that it's not what they want right now.

entities.name: headmaster_of_hogwarts
entities.description: The position held by Dumbledore at Hogwarts.

entities.name: order_of_suspension
entities.description: A document presented to Dumbledore by Malfoy, which contains the signatures of twelve governors.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Lucius are having a conversation about Dumbledore's suspension.
Malfoy is presenting the Order of Suspension to Dumbledore.
Fudge is opposing Dumbledore's suspension, as he thinks it's not what they want right now.
Lucius is representing the governors in their decision to suspend Dumbledore.
